caption.title: Probability of an edge forming between each possible pairing of the 303 people in the network who are (1.0) or are not (0.0) both from the main kinship group.
caption.p: Dots representing the probability of each possible edge calculated from exponential random graph models are orange for man-woman pairs and blue for same-gender pairs. Key: A = M2, B = M3, C = M4, D = M5, E = M6, F = M7.
